item.description:
Foodies unite and join me at the Wintertime Farmers Market at the Hope Artiste Building in Pawtucket for some local treats. Sample delicious, locally made foods like cheese, pesto, jams, ice cream and more from over 40 vendors! We can have lunch at the farmers market or go to a local venue.

Per Web site:
Come enjoy all that grows in Rhode Island year-round!

ALL WINTER (AND SPRING) LONG: Lettuces, arugula, bok choi, kale, collards, cabbage, chard, apples, cider, potatoes, sweet potatoes, onions, leeks, garlic, radishes, fresh herbs, beets, carrots, parsnips, turnips, winter squash, oysters, beef, pork, Narragansett Creamery cheese, eggs, honey, maple syrup

ALSO from local producers: jams, jellies, artisan breads and pastries, gluten-free breads, tortillas, chocolates, fair-trade coffee hot or by the pound, gifts for your favorite foodie

http://www.farmfresh....
item.name: Shopping and lunch at the Wintertime Farmers Market (Hope Artiste Building)
